Message.Title: Anyone now gettting daily sales email from AMZN
Message.Msg: Never before have I gotten a daily email promotion from Amazon, until the last 3 weeks or so. (Sure before I might get an email when I clicked on a product that took me to the site from somewhere else....) And early this week they sent me a promo for laptop sales that included free 12 month financing. Am I just new to this aspect of AMZN's marketing or is everyone now getting this.......did Amazon just start this marketing invention or are they trying to drive sales harder in this week quarter?? Would be interesting to know.
